metadata.title: CVE-2018-9996 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in cplus-dem.c in GNU libiberty, as distributed inGNU Binutils 2.30. Stack Exhaustion occurs in the C++ demangling functionsprovided by libiberty, and there are recursive stack frames:demangle_template_value_parm, demangle_integral_value, anddemangle_expression.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
